title: Adaptive Brightness will turn off without input (Pixel 3)
content:
I have a Pixel 3 with Android 10 (Build QP1A.191105.003) 

I have the Adaptive Brightness enabled. After a couple of days I will notice that it's no longer working. I'll go into the setting and it will be disabled. I re-enable it and after a couple of days it's turned itself off again. Rinse repeat. 

Is anyone else having this problem?
